content: I am a PhD candidate in Data and Artificial Intelligence group (DART) at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU). I am part of the Trondheim Analytica (TA) project, which is a collaboration between different NTNU departments for processing and analysing data from social platforms like Twitter and Facebook to gain insights about user behaviours.

title: Hassan Abedi Firouzjaei
